/* pettyCashMapper.selectCustodianList */
SELECT T1.COST_CENTR ,T2.COST_CENTER_TEXT AS COST_CENTR_NAME ,T1.CUSTDN AS MEM_ACC_ID ,T3.MEM_ACC_NAME ,T1.HEAD_DEPT_FLAG ,T4.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,T4.ATCH_FILE_ID ,T4.ATCH_FILE_NAME ,T4.FILE_EXTSN ,T4.FILE_CNT ,T1.CRT_DT ,T1.UPD_DT ,T1.CRT_USER_ID ,T5.USER_NAME FROM FCM0011M T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0008M T2 ON T1.COST_CENTR = T2.COST_CENTER LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T3 ON T1.CUSTDN = T3.MEM_ACC_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY F1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ORDER BY F1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,F2.ATCH_FILE_ID) AS RNUM ,F1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,F2.ATCH_FILE_ID ,F2.ATCH_FILE_NAME ,F2.FILE_EXTSN ,COUNT (F1.ATCH_FILE_ID) OVER (PARTITION BY F1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID) FILE_CNT FROM SYS0070M F1 LEFT JOIN SYS0071D F2 ON F1.ATCH_FILE_ID = F2.ATCH_FILE_ID ) F WHERE F.RNUM = 1) T4 ON T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = T4.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M T5 ON T1.CRT_USER_ID = T5.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND T1.UPD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startDt}, 'DD/MM/YYYY')
AND T1.UPD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endDt}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') + 1
AND T1.CUSTDN LIKE '%' || #{memAccID} || '%'
AND T1.COST_CENTR LIKE '%' || #{costCenter} || '%'
AND T5.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{crtUserId} || '%'
ORDER BY T1.CRT_DT, T1.UPD_DT

/* pettyCashMapper.selectUserNric */
SELECT USER_NRIC FROM SYS0047M WHERE USER_NAME = #{memAccId}

/* pettyCashMapper.selectCustodianInfo */
SELECT T1.COST_CENTR ,T2.COST_CENTER_TEXT AS COST_CENTR_NAME ,T1.CUSTDN AS MEM_ACC_ID ,T3.MEM_ACC_NAME ,T3.BANK_CODE ,T3.BANK_NAME ,T3.BANK_ACC_NO ,T1.HEAD_DEPT_FLAG ,T1.CUSTDN_NRIC ,T1.APPV_CASH_AMT ,T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,T1.CUSTDN_REM ,T1.CRT_USER_ID ,T4.USER_NAME FROM FCM0011M T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0008M T2 ON T1.COST_CENTR = T2.COST_CENTER LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T3 ON T1.CUSTDN = T3.MEM_ACC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M T4 ON T1.CRT_USER_ID = T4.USER_ID WHERE T1.COST_CENTR = #{costCentr}
mapper.delete: /* pettyCashMapper.deleteCustodian */ DELETE FROM FCM0011M WHERE COST_CENTR = #{costCentr} AND CUSTDN = #{memAccId}

/* pettyCashMapper.selectRequestList */
SELECT T.CLM_NO, T.COST_CENTR, T.COST_CENTR_NAME, T.MEM_ACC_ID, T.MEM_ACC_NAME, 'MYR' AS CUR, T.APPV_CASH_AMT, T.REQST_AMT, T.REQST_NO, T.CRT_DT, T.REQST_DT, T.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, T.ATCH_FILE_ID, T.ATCH_FILE_NAME, T.FILE_EXTSN, T.FILE_CNT, T.APPV_PRCSS_STUS_CODE, T.APPV_PRCSS_STUS, T.APPV_PRCSS_DT FROM (SELECT T1.CLM_NO, T1.COST_CENTR, T1.COST_CENTR_NAME, T1.MEM_ACC_ID, T2.MEM_ACC_NAME, T1.APPV_CASH_AMT, T1.REQST_AMT, T1.CLM_NO AS REQST_NO, T1.CRT_DT, T4.REQST_DT, T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, T3.ATCH_FILE_ID, T3.ATCH_FILE_NAME, T3.FILE_EXTSN, T3.FILE_CNT, Nvl (T4.APPV_PRCSS_STUS, 'T') AS APPV_PRCSS_STUS_CODE, Nvl (( CASE T4.APPV_PRCSS_STUS WHEN 'R' THEN 'Request' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Approve In-Progress' WHEN 'A' THEN 'Approved' WHEN 'J' THEN 'Rejected' END ), 'Temporary Save') AS APPV_PRCSS_STUS, T4.APPV_PRCSS_DT FROM FCM0012D T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T2 ON T1.MEM_ACC_ID = T2.MEM_ACC_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT Row_number () OVER ( PARTITION BY F1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ORDER BY F1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID , F2.ATCH_FILE_ID) AS RNUM, F1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, F2.ATCH_FILE_ID, F2.ATCH_FILE_NAME, F2.FILE_EXTSN, Count (F1.ATCH_FILE_ID) OVER ( PARTITION BY F1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID) AS FILE_CNT FROM SYS0070M F1 LEFT JOIN SYS0071D F2 ON F1.ATCH_FILE_ID = F2.ATCH_FILE_ID) F WHERE F.RNUM = 1) T3 ON T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = T3.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID LEFT JOIN FCM0004M T4 ON T1.APPV_PRCSS_NO = T4.APPV_PRCSS_NO) T WHERE 1 = 1
AND T.CRT_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startDt}, 'DD/MM/YYYY')
AND T.CRT_DT < TO_DATE(#{endDt}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') + 1
AND T.MEM_ACC_ID LIKE '%' || #{memAccID} || '%'
AND T.COST_CENTR LIKE '%' || #{costCenter} || '%'
AND T.APPV_PRCSS_STUS_CODE IN
#{item}
ORDER BY T.CLM_NO, T.REQST_DT

/* pettyCashMapper.selectNextClmNo */ SELECT 'R1' || TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm') || NVL (TO_CHAR (MAX (SUBSTR (CLM_NO, 7, 4) + 1), 'FM0000'), '0001') AS CLM_NO FROM FCM0012D WHERE SUBSTR (CLM_NO, 3, 4) = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm')

/* pettyCashMapper.selectNextIfKey */ SELECT 961 || TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymmdd') || '_' || NVL (TO_CHAR (MAX (SUBSTR (IF_KEY, 11, 7) + 1), 'FM0000000'), '0000001') AS IF_KEY FROM ITF0961M WHERE SUBSTR (IF_KEY, 4, 6) = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymmdd')
/* pettyCashMapper.selectNextSeq */ SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ) + 1, 1) AS SEQ FROM ITF0961M WHERE IF_KEY = #{ifKey}

/* pettyCashMapper.selectRequestInfo */
SELECT T1.CLM_NO, T1.COST_CENTR, T1.COST_CENTR_NAME, T1.MEM_ACC_ID, T2.MEM_ACC_NAME, T1.BANK_CODE, T2.BANK_NAME, T1.BANK_ACC_NO, T1.CUSTDN_NRIC, T1.APPV_CASH_AMT, T1.REQST_AMT, TO_CHAR(T1.PAY_DUE_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS PAY_DUE_DT, T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, T1.REQST_REM, T1.APPV_PRCSS_NO, T1.CRT_USER_ID, T3.USER_NAME FROM FCM0012D T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T2 ON T1.MEM_ACC_ID = T2.MEM_ACC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M T3 ON T1.CRT_USER_ID = T3.USER_ID WHERE T1.CLM_NO = #{clmNo}
/* pettyCashMapper.selectTaxCodePettyCashFlag */ SELECT TAX_CODE , TAX_NAME FROM FCM0007C WHERE PETTY_CASH_FLAG = 'X'

/* pettyCashMapper.selectNextClmNo */ SELECT 'J2' || TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm') || NVL (TO_CHAR (MAX (SUBSTR (CLM_NO, 7, 4) + 1), 'FM0000'), '0001') AS CLM_NO FROM FCM0013M WHERE SUBSTR (CLM_NO, 3, 4) = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm')
/* pettyCashMapper.selectNextExpClmSeq */ SELECT NVL(MAX(CLM_SEQ) + 1, 1) AS CLM_SEQ FROM FCM0014D WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo}

/* pettyCashMapper.selectExpenseItems */
SELECT T1.CLM_SEQ, T3.COST_CENTR, T3.COST_CENTR_NAME, T3.MEM_ACC_ID, T1.EXP_TYPE, T1.EXP_TYPE_NAME, T1.GL_ACC_CODE, T1.GL_ACC_CODE_NAME, T1.BUDGET_CODE, T1.BUDGET_CODE_NAME, T1.SUPPLIER AS S_MEM_ACC_NAME, T4.MEM_ACC_ID AS S_MEM_ACC_ID, T1.INVC_TYPE, ( CASE T1.INVC_TYPE WHEN 'F' THEN 'Full Tax invoice' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Simplified Tax invoice' END ) AS INVC_TYPE_NAME, T1.INVC_NO, TO_CHAR(T1.INVC_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INVC_DT, T1.GST_RGIST_NO, T1.TAX_CODE, T2.TAX_NAME, 'MYR' AS CUR, T1.GST_BEFOR_AMT, T1.GST_AMT, T1.TOT_AMT, T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, T1.EXP_DESC, T3.TOT_AMT AS ALL_TOT_AMT, T3.APPV_PRCSS_NO FROM FCM0014D T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0007C T2 ON T1.TAX_CODE = T2.TAX_CODE LEFT JOIN FCM0013M T3 ON T1.CLM_NO = T3.CLM_NO LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T4 ON T1.SUPPLIER = T4.MEM_ACC_NAME WHERE T1.CLM_NO = #{clmNo} ORDER BY T1.CLM_SEQ

/* pettyCashMapper.selectExpenseInfo */
SELECT T1.CLM_SEQ, T2.COST_CENTR, T2.COST_CENTR_NAME, T2.MEM_ACC_ID, T3.MEM_ACC_NAME, T2.CUSTDN_NRIC, T2.BANK_CODE, T3.BANK_NAME, T2.BANK_ACC_NO, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T2.CLM_MONTH, 'YYYYMM'), 'MM/YYYY') AS CLM_MONTH, T2.TOT_AMT AS ALL_TOT_AMT, T2.APPV_PRCSS_NO, T1.EXP_TYPE, T1.EXP_TYPE_NAME, T1.GL_ACC_CODE, T1.GL_ACC_CODE_NAME, T1.BUDGET_CODE, T1.BUDGET_CODE_NAME, T1.SUPPLIER AS S_MEM_ACC_NAME, T4.MEM_ACC_ID AS S_MEM_ACC_ID, T1.INVC_TYPE, T1.INVC_NO, TO_CHAR(T1.INVC_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INVC_DT, T1.GST_RGIST_NO, T1.TAX_CODE, 'MYR' AS CUR, T1.GST_BEFOR_AMT, T1.GST_AMT, T1.TOT_AMT, T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, T1.EXP_DESC FROM FCM0014D T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0013M T2 ON T1.CLM_NO = T2.CLM_NO LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T3 ON T2.MEM_ACC_ID = T3.MEM_ACC_ID LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T4 ON T1.SUPPLIER = T4.MEM_ACC_NAME WHERE T1.CLM_NO = #{clmNo} AND T1.CLM_SEQ = #{clmSeq}

/* pettyCashMapper.selectAttachList */ SELECT T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,T1.ATCH_FILE_ID ,T2.ATCH_FILE_NAME FROM SYS0070M T1 LEFT JOIN SYS0071D T2 ON T1.ATCH_FILE_ID = T2.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = #{atchFileGrpId} ORDER BY T1.ATCH_FILE_ID
mapper.delete: /* pettyCashMapper.deletePettyCashExpItem */ DELETE FROM FCM0014D WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo} AND CLM_SEQ = #{clmSeq}
mapper.update: /* pettyCashMapper.updatePettyCashExpTotAmt */ UPDATE FCM0013M SET TOT_AMT = #{allTotAmt} WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo}
